Title: Requires drug screening for children between the ages of twelve and eighteen as part of an annual physical exam
Summary: Requires drug screening for children between the ages of twelve and eighteen as part of an annual physical exam and requires certain insurance policies to provide coverage for such screening.
LawCode: Add §2509-a, Pub Health L; amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to providing drug screening for certain children; and to amend the insurance law, in relation to providing coverage for such drug screening
